thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PLUS Delmere Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: An Excellent Hotel
thread.title_full: An Excellent Hotel - Review of BEST WESTERN PLUS Delmere Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Cplmo123
title: An Excellent Hotel
text:
We stayed here over the weekend and were very impressed. The rooms are very clean, comfortable,quiet and in immaculate condition. The staff were friendly and helpful at all times. We will always use this hotel when visiting London from now on.
Room Tip: Rooms 108 or 208 are very quiet and convenient. See more room tips
